name: wastebin
description: Wastebin is a simple self-hosted pastebin service for sharing text snippets and logs. It offers syntax highlighting, expiration options, and a minimalistic web UI.
features: Text sharing: Quickly share code snippets, logs, or text content with automatically generated shareable links.
Syntax highlighting: Display code with proper syntax highlighting for over 100 programming languages and formats.
Expiration options: Set automatic deletion times ranging from minutes to never for temporary or permanent pastes.
Raw text access: Retrieve paste content as plain text via direct URLs for easy integration with scripts and tools.
Private pastes: Create password-protected pastes that require authentication before viewing content.
Burn after reading: Enable one-time view mode where pastes self-destruct after being read once.
API access: Programmatically create and retrieve pastes using a simple REST API for automation workflows.
No registration: Share content immediately without creating accounts or providing personal information.
Minimal interface: Focus on functionality with a clean, distraction-free UI that loads quickly.
Self-hosted privacy: Keep sensitive logs and code snippets on your own infrastructure without third-party exposure.
Custom URLs: Generate short, memorable URLs for pastes to make sharing easier.
Line numbering: View code with line numbers for easier reference and discussion in code reviews.
